headline.main: Michigan to Offer Prize in Fight Against Invasive Asian Carp
headline.print_headline: Michigan to Offer Prize in Fight Against Invasive Asian Carp

lead_paragraph: Faced with the threat that Asian carp could enter the Great Lakes, Michigan is turning to the public for new ideas and plans to offer a prize to whoever comes up with a way to stop the voracious fish.
snippet: Faced with the threat that Asian carp could enter the Great Lakes, Michigan is turning to the public for new ideas and plans to offer a prize to whoever comes up with a way to stop the voracious fish....
